column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police raided an illegal gambling site
column4: named as Jin Seng- Anime City
column5: located along Street 78 in Tonle Bassac
column6: Chamkarmon Phnom Penh at 10:00 pm on 10th July 2020.------According to local sources
column7: the gambling venue is loaded with fishing games
column8: an illegal form of gambling.------After the crackdown game consoles were seized and 20 people were detained
column9: including 18 Chinese nationals. Two people were sent to the for further legal action.------ PPR
